titleStmt.title: SII 5.294: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 294. (A.R. No. 6 of 1894). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṭant Aiyuñ jayamaṭant Aiyun tiruppuyaṅkaḷil li
ṉi tiruppa Irunilamum perumai yeyta Eṇṭicaiyuṅ kuṭai niḻaṟṟa maṉṉa
varellām van=tiṟaiñca marapile varumuṭi cūṭit teṉkumari mutalākiya
tiraikkaṭa lellaiyākap pārmuḻutuṅ kayalāṇai paran=tu ceṅkoluṭa
ṉ vaḻara maṉṉiya virasiṁhāsanattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāḷuṭaṉ viṟṟi
run=taruḷi māmutal matikkulam viḷakkiya komutaṟ koccaṭaiyapatma
rāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavatevaṟku yāṇṭu 3 ṟāvatu
pākaṉūṟkkūṟṟattuc coḻān=takaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu viṭṭaruḷiṉa
⌈koyilil Uḷḷālai Aḻakiyapāṇṭiyaṉ kūṭattup paḷḷikkaṭṭilil
pāṇḍyarājaṉi leḷun=ta ruḷiyiruntu puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷattār ceyyattiruvāy
moḻin=taruḷiṉapaṭi teṉkallakanāṭṭuc cen=taṉerikkaṭṭik kaḷḷūr śrīmulasthā
namuṭaiyār koyilil pākaṉūrkūṟṟattuc coḻān=takaccaturvvetimaṅkalat
tu brāhmaṇaṉ tirukkaṭavūrc cuppiramaṇṇiyaṉ cirāmaṉāṉa ceracikāmaṇibrahmam
ārāyaṉum Atijayamaṅkalattuk kāviṭṭaṉ mutta cirāmapaṭṭaṉum vaṭukaṉ Ātittaṉum karumāṇikkañ
cīrāmaṉāṉa śrīvallava brahmamārāyaṉum karumāṇikkan=tattaṉum Uḷḷiṭṭār kūṭa
star Eḻun=taruḷuvitta kūttāṭumtevaṟkum Ivar nampirāṭṭiyāṟkum tiruppaṭi
māṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum niman=taṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka nirvāttu pramāṇam paṇ
ṇikkuṭutta pramāṇappaṭi coḻān=takaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu melpiṭākai I
varkaḷ kāṇiyāṉa paṭṭakuṟicci paḻampaṭi nilam muṉṟaraiye Iraṇṭumāvum mu
ṉṉuṭaiyārum paḻamperum brahmateyamāy varukiṟapaṭiyum tavirn=tu yāṇṭu
muṉṟāvatu mutal Ittevarkkey kārāṇmai mikāḻcci Uḷppaṭa puravariviḷāka
meṉṉum peyarāl veṟu piṟittu An=tarāyamuḷppaṭat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyākap pe
ṟaveṇṭumeṉṟu kaliṅkattaraiyaṉ namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil teṉkallakanāṭṭuc
⌈cen=taṉerikaṭṭikkaḷḷūr śrīmulasthānamuṭaiyār koyilil pākaṉūṟkūṟṟattuc coḻā
n=takaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu braāhma ṇaṉ tirukkaṭavūrc cubrahmaṇṇiyaṉ cirāmaṉāṉa ce
racikāmaṇi brahmamārāyaṉum kāviṭṭaṉ vaṭuka ṉātittaṉum mutta cirāmapaṭṭaṉum karumāṇikkañ cirāmaṉāṉa śrī
vallava brahmamārāyaṉuṅ karumāṇikka n=tattaṉum Uḷḷiṭṭā
r kūṭastar Eḻun=taruḷuvitta kūttāṭumtevaṟkum Ivar nampi
rāṭṭiyāṟkum tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku
m tiruviḻāppaṭikkum nirvārttu pramā ṇam paṇṇikkuṭutta
pramāṇappaṭi coḻān=takaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu melpiṭākaip pa
ṭṭakuṟicciyāṉa puravariviḻākam nilamāy van=tajanā laiya pilāṟṟukku
patinañcāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu kūvāṇaivatikku vaṭakku 10 2 m pāṭakamum 10 3 m
pāṭakamum 14 m pāṭakamum 10 5 m pāṭakamum 10 6 m pāṭakamum 10 7 m pā
ṭakamum 10 8 m pāṭakamum 10 9 m pāṭakamum 2 10 m pāṭakamum Ippil
āṟukku meṟku 10 6 catirattu Ivvatikku vaṭakku 10 2 m pāṭakamum 10 3 m pāṭaka
mum 10 4 m pāṭakamum 10 5 m pāṭakamum 10 6 m pāṭakamum 10 7 m pāṭaka
mum 10 8 m pāṭakamum 10 9 m pāṭakamum 2 10 m pāṭakamum Ippilāṟukku
meṟku 10 7 ca Ivatikku vaṭakku 10 2 m pāṭakamum 10 3 m pāṭakamum 10 4
m pāṭakamum 10 5 m pāṭakamum 16 m pāṭakamum 10 7 m pāṭakamum 10 8 m pā
ṭakamum 10 9 m pāṭakamum 2 10 m pāṭakamum Ippilāṟṟukku meṟku 10 8 ca I
vatikku vaṭakku 10 2 m pāṭakamum 10 3 m pāṭakamum 10 4 m pāṭakamum 10
pāṭakamum 10 6 m pāṭakamum 10 7 m pāṭakamum 10 8 m pāṭakamum 19 m pāṭa
kamum 2 10 m pāṭakamum Ippilāṟṟukku meṟku 19 ca Ivatikku vaṭakku 12 m
pāṭakamum 10 3 m pāṭakamum 10 4 m pāṭakamum 10 5 m pāṭakamum 10 6 m pāṭa
kamum 10 7 m pāṭakamum 10 8 m pāṭakamum 10 9 m pāṭakamum 2 10 m pāṭakamum I
ppilāṟṟukku meṟku 2 10 ca Ivatikku vaṭakku 10 2 m pāṭakamum 10 3 m pāṭa
kamum 10 4 m pāṭakamum 10 5 m pāṭakamum 16 m pāṭakamum 10 7 m pāṭaka
mum 10 8 m pāṭakamum 10 9 m pāṭakamum 2 10 m pāṭakamum 2 10 3 m pāṭakam vaṭakkaṭai
ya m 2 10 4 m pāṭakamum Ippilāṟṟukku meṟku 2 10 1 ca Ivatikkuvaṭakku 12 m
pāṭakamum 10 3 m pāṭakamum 10 4 m pāṭakamum 10 5 m pāṭakamum 10 6 m pāṭakamum
10 7 m pāṭakamum 10 8 m pāṭakamum 10 9 m pāṭakamum 2 10 m pāṭakamum2 10 2 m pāṭakamum is written above the line. 2 10 3 m pāṭakattil vaṭakkaṭai
ya pāṭakam m 2 10 4 m pāṭakamum Ippilāṟṟu meṟku 2 10 2 Ivatikku vaṭa
kku 10 2 m pāṭakamum 10 3 m pāṭakamum 14 m pāṭakamum 10 5 m pāṭakamum 1
6 m pāṭakamum 10 7 m pāṭakamum Ākay paḻampaṭiyi seḻanṟumuṭThe rest of the inscription cannot be traced•
Digital edition of SII 5.294 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
